name: IntellCorp
headAddress: Avenida do Atl?ntico n. 16 Ed. Panoramic, Escrit?rio 02.03
membership: Intellcorp is a member of AFCEA.
goal: IntellCorp represents dozens of years of experience in Intelligence, Counterintelligence, Diplomacy, and Defense and Security. There are more than seventy direct and indirect collaborators working with us, such as former Intelligence Officers (analysts and operational elements), diplomats, military and security senior officers, special forces, marines, paratroopers, and many others with a wide experience both in the private and the public sectors. From strategic to tactical research and analysis and operations, we are experts in Intelligence and Counterintelligence.
interests: Communication, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Enlargement, Enterprise, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: We try to follow EU policies, inciatives and legislative files on Data Security, Informations and Intelligence.
